src:
Vals alarm bij gaslek in Action in De Schoof Hendrik-Ido-Ambacht

06 Nov 2019, 12:51

De Action in winkelcentrum De Schoof in Hendrik-Ido-Ambacht is woensdagmiddag ontruimd geweest omdat er vermoedelijk een gaslek was.
Bij metingen van de brandweer, die in de Action en omliggende winkels werden uitgevoerd, werd echter geen gaslek gevonden. Omdat het vals alarm was, werd de winkel weer geopend.
text:
False alarm in case of gas leak in Action in De Schoof Hendrik-Ido-Ambacht

06 Nov 2019, 12:51

The Action in De Schoof shopping center in Hendrik-Ido-Ambacht was evacuated on Wednesday afternoon because there was probably a gas leak.
However, no gas leak was found during measurements of the fire brigade that were carried out in the Action and surrounding stores. Because it was a false alarm, the store was opened again.
